title: Beech-Nut Nutrition Recalls Baby Food Product Due to Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, April 14, 2015 Beech-Nut Nutrition, an Amsterdam, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,920 pounds of baby food products that may be contaminated with small pieces of glass, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The baby food product was...
